page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content: The main recreation in the area is walking and the area is criss_crossed by public footpaths and bridleways all of which are well used. Kinsbourne Green Common is used for walking, kite flying, picnics and horse_riding. Redbourn Golf Club is fairly new, it is a private course and was converted into a Golf Club from a farm in the 1970's. It has an 18 hole and a 9 hole course as well as a practice course. Harpendenbury Riding Stables use the farm house and buildings and a small area for practice jumps, riding school and training. The Hertfordshire Show Ground is localed to the west of the A5 just north of Redbourn. The show is held annually over the Spring Bank holiday. It is an agricultural show with other country attractions.
